bibl.title: Alexander's Non-European Troops and Ptolemy I's Use of Such Troops.
bibl.note: Alexanders Recruitment of Non-European Troops. - Ptolemy's Use of Non-European Troops. - P. 109: Suggests that the "Macedones" and the "Persae" came with Alexander's body and settled in Egypt. The addition of τῆς ἐπιγονῆς indicates a subsequent generation.
bibl.seg: HAMMOND N.G.L., Alexander's Non-European Troops and Ptolemy I's Use of Such Troops.

Alexanders Recruitment of Non-European Troops. - Ptolemy's Use of Non-European Troops. - P. 109: Suggests that the "Macedones" and the "Persae" came with Alexander's body and settled in Egypt. The addition of τῆς ἐπιγονῆς indicates a subsequent generation.
